#summary building NHD2 for generic x86.

= HowTO =

apt-get install autoconf libtool libavformat-dev libswscale-dev g++ libopenthreads-dev libglew-dev freeglut3-dev libcurl4-gnutls-dev libfreetype6-dev libid3tag0-dev libmad0-dev libogg-dev libpng12-dev libgif-dev libjpeg-turbo8-dev libvorbis-dev.

== check out makefiles ==
svn checkout http://neutrinohd2.googlecode.com/svn/trunk neutrino-pc
= =
cd neutrino-pc
== ==
rename or copy Makefile.native to Makefile
== ==
= to build neutrino =
make neutrino

= to update neutrino Source Code =
make neutrino-update

= to clean neutrino build =
make neutrino-clean

= to distclean neutrino build =
make neutrino-distclean
